description:
The Ollan Sleeping Bag is perfect for the outdoor adventurer who wants to reduce their environmental impact without sacrificing performance. Made with a Pertex Bio-based fabric and recycled HL-ElixR™ ECO insulation, this sleeping bag is lightweight and packable, while still providing the warmth you need on cold nights.

  • Lightweight shell and lining are made with durable Pertex Quantum nylon ripstop
  • Plant-based Pertex fabric is sustainably sourced from Castor Beans
  • HL-ElixR Micro™ wool/polyester insulation maintains consistent warmth even in damp conditions
  • Adjustable drawcord to cinch the hood when it's chilly
  • Locking two-way anti-snag zipper is full-length
  • Internal stash pocket fits a headlamp or contact lenses
  • Includes a stuff sack
name: Marmot Ollan -9C WoolPoly Sleeping Bag - Unisex
